subtitle.0: Straight Games, No Filler: Your weekly podcast for gaming trends past and present!

description.content: We break down the biggest gaming news of the week, from major studio announcements to exciting new releases and industry developments.
This week we shine a light on amazing indie games that deserve more attention, featuring interviews with developers and gameplay highlights.
We dive deep into the resurgence of retro gaming, from classic arcade games to modern remakes, and why these timeless titles still captivate players today.
In this episode, we explore the latest trends in gaming technology, from VR to cloud gaming, and discuss what the future holds for gamers worldwide.
Welcome to Status Quo! In this episode, we introduce ourselves and discuss what listeners can expect from this weekly gaming podcast.
